video_prompt: A tall, slender anime-style male figure walks forward on a dark street, his determined expression unwavering. His windswept, light gray hair subtly shifts with his movement. His trench coat billows behind him, reflecting faint city lights. His right hand is tucked into his jacket, while his left arm bends slightly. Subtle leg motion causes wrinkles in his trousers as he progresses across a pedestrian crosswalk.
image_prompt: Anime style, full shot of a tall, slender male character with light gray spiky hair, fair skin, sharp features, and piercing blue eyes, walking forward with a determined expression on a dark street with muted lighting, on a pedestrian crosswalk. He wears an impeccably tailored, form-fitting, shiny black suit: white collared shirt, black tie, double-breasted suit jacket, long trench coat flowing behind, black trousers, black belt with silver buckle, black dress shoes, and black gloves. His right hand is in his suit jacket pocket, left arm bent. Dark, blurred urban background with indistinct red and yellow lights. Prominent white pedestrian crosswalk stripes. Subtle ground shadows. Serious, stylish, mysterious mood.
refined_video_prompt: The anime figure advances with an unwavering, determined expression. His windswept hair subtly shifts. His trench coat billows, dynamically reflecting faint city lights. His left arm swings gently. Subtle leg motion creates dynamic wrinkles in his trousers as he progresses across the pedestrian crosswalk.
